title: teammate Tahm trolling is such a pain.
body:
I just had a game with a friend and got matched up someone playing tahm in the team, he is not contribute to the team at all, instead he control the carry of the team not leting him out of base or thrown him alone to the enemy , this is so ruin the game. 3v5 the whole time, and the most fed one in the our team is marked by tahm .
Any possible solution? what do you guys think about a trol tahm ?{{summoner:14}} {{champion:223}} {{item:3751}}
